detaileddescription.para: board timer counter in timer interrupt

briefdescription.para: Board bare-metal timer interrupt. Interrupt frequency is based on the defined BOARD_SYS_TIMER_HZ.
Initialise bare-metal board timer and interrupt.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called in board_init, and it initializes the 1-MS timer interrupt for bare-metal mode

briefdescription.para: Update timer counter and other MS period operation in cycling interrupt and must be called periodically.
Get current timer's counter value in ticks.
Get current passed us since timer init.
Get current passed ms since timer init.
Get board timer counter in timer interrupt.
Function for delaying execution for number of milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para:
This function needs a 1-MS timer interrupt to work. For bare-metal, it is implemented in this file.
ms
Delay in milliseconds
